name: WhiteInBlack
description:
A new game from BUG-Studio is a complex, but at the same time very interesting arcade game in which your reaction will be seriously tested.

Tapan white or black circles and squares to change the color of the background and continue the game.
Dial as many points, and then publish your record in the global high score table.
Unusual gameplay will make you play WhiteInBlack again and again.
Good Luck!

Features:
-An unusual gameplay that will make you play the game again and again.
-Excellent Sound that supports the rhythm of the game.
-World Table of records. Can you become # 1 in the world?
